alert.note: Alert for Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:19PM EDT until June 26 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wayne County in western New York... Northeastern Ontario County in western New York... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Geneva, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Newark, Lyons, Clyde, Phelps, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Rose, Huron, Savannah, and Wolcott. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
